reviewText:
This combo is a good 'slice of life' in the "dojin" world and will do great things for your spoken Japanese if not for your eyesight because
all the naughty bits are pixilated so you would never guess these areas are human male and female external sexual organs. and they come together a lot in a variety of interesting ways.  Nevertheless, instead
of organs just banging away at each other, there is a discernable plot or story-line in each episode and each hangs together in a sensible fashion. If you have no Japanese, the story is still understandible even
if it will never make the NY Times book list; it's intened to be fun - and it is.
I believe the whole is intended to be pornographic fun and it achieves that goal completely.  AND - on top of it all, the art-work is first-rate.
